document_data.title: H1 Keep on the Shadowfell

Index.Creatures: :[[Dark creeper]] • {{P|[[Deathjump spider]]|64-65}} • [[Gelatinous cube]] • [[Ghoul]] • [[Giant rat]] • [[Gnome]] • [[Goblin]] • [[Guard drake]] • [[Halfling]] • [[Hobgoblin]] • [[Kobold]] • [[Kruthik]] • [[Ochre jelly]] • [[Skeleton]] • [[Vampire spawn]] • [[Wight]] • [[Zombie]]

document_data.Behind the scenes:
While ''Keep on the Shadowfell'' was designed initially for the "[[Nerath|Points of Light]]" core setting for 4th edition [[Dungeons & Dragons|D&D]], alterations to the adventure made in an article in [[Dungeon magazine 155|''Dungeon'' magazine #155]] made it possible to use it as a dungeon for characters in the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]''. These changes included changing the focus on [[Orcus]] to that of [[Shar]] and relocating [[Winterhaven]] to a geographical location in [[Faerûn]] between [[Cormyr]] and [[Sembia]].

In April 2009, the adventure was released online at [[Wizards of the Coast]]'s official website for download.
